website_summaries.verdict: The top choice from BenQ for the best home theater projector with an outstanding image.
pros: Projector creates a bright image with great contrast and color reproduction right out of the box
Quieter and cooler than many other high-end projectors
Can project on a wall from a side angle
cons: Speakers do not have the same audio quality as a dedicated, surround sound setup

website_summaries.verdict: The BenQ HT3050 home-entertainment projector delivers excellent 2D and 3D image quality and a touch more capability than less-expensive, entry-level models.

customer_reviews.title: Best Bang for Your Buck, Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: Did about a month of research before purchasing a projector. This one and a $2000 sony were my final options, and I felt the value of this Benq would exceed that of the Sony. As best as I can tell so far, 100% correct. Setup was simple, unit has two dials for enlarging and sharpening the picture, and provides a crisp 135" 1080p image with excellent color accuracy at just 11 feet away.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph Red Cloud-Owen

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good projector as an upgarde to my my existing old nonHD projector. Initially, I bought couple of other projectors but was not happy with the quality. Then, I saw good reveiws for this projector and thought of trying it as well. I called the professionals to install the new projector along with new Silver Ticket projector screen. Believe me, I am so impressed by the picture that I now prefer to watch every movie on this set-up. Picture is so crystal clear. Black is black and not grey. So crisp that I can see the dust particles flying when during movie someone was running in the field. So impressive. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: ska

customer_reviews.title: HDMI ports do not last!
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was terrific. I have used it maybe 8-9 times in the past two years. The hdmi ports have been nothing but trouble. I originally thought it was the cables and spent money replacing them. Then it was detecting the cable but no playing them. Now the cable light isn’t going on. Very, very dissatisfied. That’s a lot of money to have collecting dust.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: HDMI ports went out
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 years ago and worked great. However, downsides. Original bulb blew in a year - just out of warranty and nowhere near estimated usage. Cleaned as best we could but left random dust/glass in the picture. HDMI port went out at 2 years. So we switched to HDMI 2. Today that port went. It is a great projector, nice picture looks good even in ambient light... but I’m not happy I spent $1000 to trash it after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I debated along time about which projector to get. After many reviews and YouTube reviews, I decided to go with the BenQ HT3050, and I do not regret it one bit! It is an absolute pleasure to watch movies and tv, but also play my ps4 on, with no lag times! I have a 110" screen and it's wonderful! I recommend this product to anyone looking for a great projector to watch movies/tv or to game on! You will not regret it!
customer_reviews.author: Lucas F.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy plug and play fantastic picture this is my third benq over the years there the best
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about this projector why buy a flat screen when you can have this. Have mine on a 120 inch screen from 12 feet away ceiling mount. The picture is so clear if you were short on money you can just use a freshly painted wall you can hardly notice the difference. Once you get used to the size and quality you never want anything else in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: mike brackett

customer_reviews.title: No adjustments for room beware!
customer_reviews.text: what a load of crap. this projector is finicky about where it goes forget putting on top of a bookshelf. no adjustments for the room. no way i can just drop it in the center of the screen and have it close to the floor. also finicky about inputs. do not buy go get something more adjustable. this is amateur hour.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J

customer_reviews.title: Bought this while waiting for 4k projectors to come down ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this while waiting for 4k projectors to come down in price (particularly short throw projectors which I need for the space I'm in). The 3050 is pre-calibrated for color, and even after running through all the calibrations there was nothing that I needed to adjust (but I'm in a dark space, YMMV). Only negative is the lack of motorized zoom, so I tend to leave it on its "fill the screen in calibration mode" position, and live with the occasional non-anamorphic DVD rather than mess with the alignment by constantly adjusting the zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great projector for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased based on a co-workers review of his BenQ HT1070. I wasn't too concerned for needing 4k resolution since content is still very minimal. I will say the Cinema Color standards supported are wonderful. We've watched several movies and loved the way it look, I would have to say it nearly looks just like any LCD TV, just way bigger. I did work on adjustments of brightness, contrast, and color, but I will say they were very minuscule adjustments. This things is pretty much ready to go out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Chris E

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this projector
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this projector. If you are looking for a good home projector that doesn’t break the bank. This is the one for you. Great contracts ratios, great picture on just a white wall (flat sheen with light orange peel), fan is pretty quiet, and setup is super simple. At this price point, you can’t get another projector that performs this well. If you like superb vivid colors and damn good blacks. You can’t go wrong with this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My first projector, and I'm delighted with the purchase (see rig details below).
customer_reviews.text: Amazing resolution and color. Really great 3D effect. Using Firestorm LT 2.0! DLP link 3D glasses. Fills my 120" screen at 11' mounting distance. This is the maximum distance away or image gets too big for the screen. Room has to be darkened to see detail in dark scenes at that size. Using Loctek PT2 LCD/DLP Projector Ceiling Mount and Homegear 120" HD Motorized 16:9 Projector Screen. Mediabridge ULTRA Series HDMI Cable (25 Feet) delivers signal from my Sony STR-DN104 Amp.
customer_reviews.author: Am4zon3r

customer_reviews.title: Cannot beat this projector.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic projector....if you are debating between a projector or a 85 inch TV do the projector....you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review/Size
customer_reviews.text: Projector is lightweight and easy to install. I managed to ceiling mount by myself relatively easily. Picture quality is great, I currently have mine set up ~12 feet away from the wall it's casting onto. Smallest picture size at this distance is ~120in. diagonally. 100in x 58in (LxH).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Davidson

customer_reviews.title: The beautiful quality and lightness of the projector
customer_reviews.text: Time and time again, Ben Q shows that their prices cannot be matched. The beautiful quality and lightness of the projector, matched with the price, cannot be beat. I am extremely pleased with this projector. For a $1000, there was no other projector on the market that can compete. This projectors competitors Have placed their product in the $3000 range. After purchasing multiple projectors, this one is still my favorite
customer_reviews.author: naomisopt

customer_reviews.title: This one is soo much better. I am glad i got this
customer_reviews.text: Well, my 13 year old Samsung 40" t.v. is on the way out, so I looked at a new bigger t.v. in the 60" size range. I had a projector 12 years ago, and it was okay. This one is soo much better. I am glad i got this. Just got a screen to put up, but the picture was pretty darn great on my off white wall. I have it set to be a 100" screen. Can't beat that. The picture is great. Easy to operate, even for me.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent picture quality! Projector is compact and silent, yet delivers a vivid crisp image. Easy to setup and install, with lots of advanced fine tuning controls to match your environment and screen. I found that on a 1.1 matte white PVC screen I had to use the 'Game' color profile instead of the 'cinema 709' profile to achieve a pure white, instead of yellow tint. At 120 in screen size it has plenty of adjustments for keystone correction, vertical shift and zoom options. Would recommend to anyone, to get a better value you would be spending thousands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Quiet and bright.
customer_reviews.text: As good as all the reviews said. Can't say it is for sure better than the lower end Ben Q but do NOT regret this purchase. Quiet and attractive. Highly recommend to anyone who has researched projectors to death and worrying about buyers remorse. You will have none. 110 in screen from 10ft with some ambient light. Beautiful. Don't be fooled by "low" lumens number. Plenty for any theater or family room.
customer_reviews.author: LuvUrNbr

customer_reviews.title: Great projector, just turn off the annoying beeping via the setup menu.
customer_reviews.text: High quality image with dark blacks. Movies and games look great. love this projector. Turn off the beeps in the menus as soon as you set it up, they're annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Tom K.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Projector, Easy Set Up
customer_reviews.text: Projector delivered on time. I installed the projector from the ceiling using - AMER Projector Mount - Universal Ceiling Bracket LCD DLP Tilt 360° Swivel 30lbs (White). Installation using this mount was straight forward and the projector mounted securely. The projector set up was very easy, upon first time start up there is an interactive walk through for the initial set up. Picture quality is great, even during the day with a little indirect sun light. Highly recommend this projector
customer_reviews.author: Steve G

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is my second BenQ projector, loved the first one but left in my last house' theater room. As advertised, the projector performs great, I am glad I bought this version, the picture is very, very good. I was surprised how good the the speakers sound. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: ... HT3050 with a 100" Elite Screen and it's truly amazing. Admittedly
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the BenQ HT3050 with a 100" Elite Screen and it's truly amazing. Admittedly, I had old technology - a 42" 720p Samsung but the picture quality of this BenQ is excellent and set up was easy. As other reviewers noted, the projector noise is very low and the sound is decent without additional speakers. The prompts using the remote control are easy. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Scott A. Burritt

customer_reviews.title: I need sleep timer
customer_reviews.text: This is a awesome projector no question about that . But it is missing the most important feature that I need a sleep timer. This is my main TV in my bedroom and I like to go to sleep watching movies. Please Benq consider putting sleep timers on your future projectors.
customer_reviews.author: 4dtv78

customer_reviews.title: Great projector. The Rec
customer_reviews.text: Great projector. The Rec.709 is spot on after doing my own calibration on User1. This for those who don't want to fool with calibrating except for a fewer minor setting. Also for those that want to go the wireless HDMI route, it has a compartment for the $400 wireless HDMI kit. In my personal opinion the picture just seems brighter and better than its little brother the HT2050.
customer_reviews.author: StacyB

customer_reviews.title: but projects a good quality 112" wide movie on the wall in my ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets a bit hot after running for a while, but projects a good quality 112" wide movie on the wall in my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent image. Good interface, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Excellent image. Good interface, easy set up. Good product and impressive technology. I hope the lamp lasts and I won't have to modify my review.
customer_reviews.author: Cats

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: This projector and a screen turn my motor home in to a movie night at home. Outstanding projector!
customer_reviews.author: timaz

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: I have it for 2 years now and it works great! In this price range I must say I am super happy, so far I have never had any problem with it! We got rid of our tv and watch our shows only trough our projector!
customer_reviews.author: Adelajda C.

customer_reviews.title: Great projector.
customer_reviews.text: Replaced an 'office' projector with this for my basement 'theater' with a 72" screen. Huge difference in the picture quality. Screen size can go much bigger with this projector, but for my space that's as big as I can go. Lighted remote - nice bonus. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: gw

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The best of the market don’t look more get this one trust me it’s fenomenal it’s the best will definitely buy more in the future thanks BenQ
customer_reviews.author: miguel

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Bright and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice and bright projector. Now I can enjoy movies during daytime. I have to wait till it's dark on my previous projector. 1080p is also a very enjoyable upgrade. Another thing I like is it's very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent projector. Quiet with very accurate colour
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector. Quiet with very accurate colour. The plastic IR receiver cover broke off from the projector when I received it, but you can reattach it if you open the upper cover. Hopefully they will address this problem in the future batch. Seems to be a QA issue. But other than that, great projector.
customer_reviews.author: Wenjun YU

customer_reviews.title: I have it in the man cave and it is the best projector I have owned
customer_reviews.text: Incredible projector! I have it in the man cave and it is the best projector I have owned. Color, brightness, contrast, all the movies, sporting events, it's just like being there.
customer_reviews.author: PKapatos

customer_reviews.title: 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box awesome. Amazing picture. Now have a movie theater in our basement. And the 3d with bluray 3d imax movies solidifies the deal. Could not recommend this projector enough. I did hours of research and comparisons before settling on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mbot

customer_reviews.title: Perfect but wish I would have got the 4K benq
customer_reviews.text: This projector is awesome however i bought it and realized there was a 4K version for a few hundred more wish I would have just bought that one
customer_reviews.author: joseph ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Awesome gaming, movie and music video Quality!! Indoor and outdoor even stemming a movie.
customer_reviews.author: Mommaof2Girls

customer_reviews.title: Great HD projector
customer_reviews.text: After giving up on trying to get 4K to work on other protectors, I decided to just go back to regular HD. This baby fit the bill. Very good picture, fan is fairly quiet, speakers surprisingly good and powerful (though I used receiver). Good solid buy
customer_reviews.author: kirk buckley

customer_reviews.title: It really feels like a cinema at home now
customer_reviews.text: stunning image! It really feels like a cinema at home now, I'm stoked
customer_reviews.author: Christian Harten

customer_reviews.title: Rich color picture
customer_reviews.text: High quality picture. Easy to setup side projection. Easy to adjust the size of picture. The only downside is that the lens shift is about only 10% up or down. I prefer putting the picture lower which not possible using its len shift.
customer_reviews.author: Meng

customer_reviews.title: 3d is amazing on it.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, I'm a nerd that still likes the 3d stuff. And this projector works great...
customer_reviews.author: John Becknell

customer_reviews.title: very impressed with the picture.
customer_reviews.text: This projector gives a very bright and sharp picture even with ambient light. I use it with a ps4 and have seen no problems with game play lag.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Teter

customer_reviews.title: Projector works ultra Great at night
customer_reviews.text: amazon delivered this unit very fast to Sri Lanka, picture quality is great at night bu i find it no so great when there is light present in the room but i must admit that i didn't look at the all the settings as yet totally happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: nalin Fernando

customer_reviews.title: Thank you BenQ.
customer_reviews.text: I ceiling mounted this projector in a home theater environment. I am very happy with the image approx. 100". Very bright, nice color, nice picture. I have recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C.

customer_reviews.title: We love it and 3d movies are out of this world
customer_reviews.text: Movie Theater Quality! I never write reviews but I felt it was a must! We love it and 3d movies are out of this world!!
customer_reviews.author: Tinika Dismuke

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, very easy to set up, nice keystone settings as well as lens shift. Turns on and off very fast. Completely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vinicius

customer_reviews.title: This projector will not leave you disappointed..
customer_reviews.text: This projector will not leave you disappointed ..... This is Paired with 6 Polk Audio speakers that are flushmount into the wall along with a subwoofer ... It sounds better than going to the Movies
customer_reviews.author: Mike Riggs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this projector! The picture is so crisp and clear, it's just amazing!
customer_reviews.author: ricky crabtree

customer_reviews.title: The picture quality is great right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: so far this projector has met my needs and then some. The picture quality is great right out of the box. Still early yet, as I've only had it for a month or so but boy, it's been great!!! I would recommend this to anyone looking for a middle of the road projector with high-end quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lamp stop working on me at 14 month (2 month ...
customer_reviews.text: Lamp stop working on me at 14 month (2 month after manufacture warranty), and I did not watch anywhere near the 7000 hours lamp life of TV because that would mean I would have watched 16.6 hours a day.
customer_reviews.author: Alain

customer_reviews.title: It's great but one of the HDMI Inputs stopped working after ...
customer_reviews.text: It's great but one of the HDMI Inputs stopped working after two months. It's past 30 days so i can't return it now.
customer_reviews.author: VERAR72787

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quality of picture is outstanding for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... I must say that this is one of the best projector system in the market for under 1k but ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Ben Q W1070 and I must say that this is one of the best projector system in the market for under 1k but I needed an upgrade and tried at first the Epson but was not satisfied.Then came the Benq HT 3050 and my search was over!This projector is definitely an upgrade and you will not regret your purchase.The sharpness,color and sounds are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: rbucla

customer_reviews.title: I wish the lens shift was a bit more flexible but other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely accurate colors and bright! I wish the lens shift was a bit more flexible but other than that it works great!
customer_reviews.author: Matthew H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Projector, have had it for about a month and have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Jonny M

customer_reviews.title: Great projector!
customer_reviews.text: Great picture at a good price. This projector was easy to set up and ceiling mount. The keystone adjustment works like a champ and the picture quality is superb.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great overhead projector for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Blown away by large, clear picture. Unbelievable for football games and beautiful scenery. Picture takes up entire wall. Love this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Home theather BenQ
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome movie theater quality love it! The 65 inch 4k curve Samsung it's not good enough for my carver stereo,this Ht3050 sound and picture is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: khong vang

customer_reviews.title: Great home theater projector.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice projector with an excellent picture. Does not require room to be completely dark to appreciate the picture. I set it up myself and it was confusing for me to get it adjusted just right as far as the angle and tilt; not as clear cut as I assumed it would be. I mounted it from the ceiling and have it linked up with a wireless HDMI system and it works really well. It also was very easy to set up with a universal remote. Once you have it installed, it is easy and straightforward to use, and the picture quality is top notch.
customer_reviews.author: brushew93

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better when compared to other products in this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Krish

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! Picture quality is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Picture quality is amazing, even when it's not completely dark. Fan sound is low. Built in Speaker is fabulous. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price, in Jan 2020.
customer_reviews.text: The picture isn’t super bright. But fine for viewing in a darkened room.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin K

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Not a good Product very disappointing broke few months after
customer_reviews.author: duquesa

customer_reviews.title: buy it you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: love it nothing bad to say at all. easy to use and can even hear it when it is on. worth ever penny
customer_reviews.author: Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for any need.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, currently have tilted up due to location, works great, the keystone adjustments work very well. When switching between eco modes for the lamp, even the most economical setting still looks great. I do everything on it, Playstation 4, chromecast, Wii U, and 3D Bluray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent HD Quality Projector
customer_reviews.text: Excellent HD Quality Projector with true colors. Easy use and doesn't get too hot or make too much noise.
customer_reviews.author: Peter O Trondsen

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great projector so far - we have used/tested it for about a week. Fan is extremely quiet and it does not throw out extreme heat. Quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks amazing. Everyone always is blown away by the Picture quality
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Jonsson

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade from my previous
customer_reviews.text: My last DLP projector lasted me almost 7 years with only 1 bulb change. When the hardware on that projector failed, I shopped around. I actually purchased a EPSON but something about it was just laggy and ended up returning it... I then spent a little extra to get this puppy... Great upgrade from my previous... My current house doesn't allow me to have a dead center screen to projector setup and the Keystone adjustment features here are the best I've ever seen. 3D works great as well. Pretty quiet setup. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MacAirFan

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 300 hours.
customer_reviews.text: 378 hours in and my projector is flickering in random spots. Pretty bummed, ive had it setup for about 24 days, and its already having issues. 105 normal hours 271 eco hours 2 smart eco hours
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing projector!! Got it for 3D movies only and has not disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Shane Merritt

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm very happy with my decision to purchase this projector
customer_reviews.text: So far I'm very happy with my decision to purchase this projector. I read a lot of reviews before I purchased and So far they have been spot on. I feel that I got a great value for a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Wayno

customer_reviews.title: Nice buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this projector 2 weeks back and i love it so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with choice.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture. The $249.00 replacement lamps are going to really add up though. But then I was figuring on buying a 75+ inch flat panel at $2500++ so the difference in TV cost will buy a fair number of lamps.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Olson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: had it about 9 months so far so good very easy set up works well looks great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional !!!
customer_reviews.text: The projector is Exceptional. I had something in mind and this projector's quality was way beyond my expectations..
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Dilip Raj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing display
customer_reviews.text: After doing a lot of research on projectors this is the most bang for the buck. I am taking off 1 point because BenQ doesn't do firmware updates with out having to send it in. In today's technology this should be either over the air or via USB thumb drive. Please fix this BenQ. The color and display is awesome. Such a major difference watching a movie on a 120" screen or watching sports where the player is actually bigger than life.
customer_reviews.author: David Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Blown away! Incredible image quality. Like viewing a Very High Quality HD Flat Panel but in glorious 120" !!!
customer_reviews.text: One word: Astounding! Very quick to setup. Excellent build quality and outstanding image. I paired this projector with an. This is a winning combination. I was simply blown away with the quality of the image. It's super bright, super sharp, amazing color, awesome contrast, the blacks are deep and the whites really white (not grayish). My choice for testing is Transformers (I) in Blu Ray. I highly recommend this projector. I'll post pictures when I finish my setup, but let me tell you, no picture will make justice to the real thing. Get it, you will not regret it.
customer_reviews.author: cadenusa

customer_reviews.title: The factory calibrated setting is excellent. I haven't felt the need to tweak it
customer_reviews.text: Superb picture quality. The factory calibrated setting is excellent. I haven't felt the need to tweak it. That was worth the extra money over the 2050. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dan K

customer_reviews.title: Recurring brightness uniformity problems
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great except the brightness is not uniform all the way across the image. Looked online and there's a lot of threads with other having this same problem and worst of all, seems that most say Benq says the brightness problem is within the specs of this product. I'm going to call them tomorrow to see what they say about my projector. Google "brightness uniformity" and you'll see the same thing I've run into. Again I love the projector aside from this, but am shocked it wasn't more prevalent in other reviews
customer_reviews.author: Jason Clodfelder

customer_reviews.title: This projector is beyond amazing! We have a hard to fit room due ...
customer_reviews.text: This projector is beyond amazing! We have a hard to fit room due to it being a large room with vaulted ceilings. I have purchased 2 other projectors trying to get one that would work and this one FINALLY did the trick! I love that you have the ability to configure it from almost anywhere. I couldnt be happier with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Blankenship

customer_reviews.title: Stunning picture
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this projector. Make sure you get a good quality screen over using a wall. It makes all the difference. Projector is very quiet and calibrated to perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H

customer_reviews.title: Best Projector
customer_reviews.text: This is the best projector for the price. I saw several projectors in my friends places but this one's the best. Colors are very vivid and bright. I am using this on my bed room wall and the projection size is about 150 inches. It is awesome as it gets. Gaming is awesome on this too. Keystone feature is great as i am projecting from a corner but picture looks straight with no issues. Pros - Keystone , built in speakers, brightness and colors. Cons - It heats up the room a little
customer_reviews.author: PatsFan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every thing it is great but the missing thing is spdf
customer_reviews.author: mohammed

customer_reviews.title: Nice projector for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice projector for the price. Unfortunately I found there to be too much motion judder for my taste. I will be returning this model and buying the benq ht4050 with the motion smoothing feature.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Great Projector
customer_reviews.text: I spent a lot of time deciding between a reasonably priced projector with great specs or a 4K "65" tv. But since I needed a bigger screen for movies and gaming I gave the 3050 a try. All I can say is that it has been so much fun and the picture quality is great at 1080p. We now have movie nights in style with a "120" screen. I have a PS4 love to play my Mortorkombart Xl and need for speed on this. Get this projector and save yourself stress of looking and comparing. This is the best projector for the money. I say DO IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cheeks

customer_reviews.title: Very nice projector. This is my first projector I am ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice projector. This is my first projector I am using the standard cinema mode 709 for movies and gaming. I have it hook to my chromecast, Xbox One and PS4. The 3d is amazing and work with any existing 3D glasses. The sound is pretty good I used it as an extra sound system with my sound bar. I am very please so far. I did have an issue with the screen adjustment bowing on the right side but that had nothing to do with the projector. my mount was not evenly installed but now that is fixed. All is well. I would recommend this projector.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Cinsoete

customer_reviews.title: which is quite annoying given being rated so high
customer_reviews.text: This is the second benq model that I buy that stop working within less of six months. It seems that the are usually caused by a faulty DMD board, which is quite annoying given being rated so high, I expected it to last more. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Nomalan

customer_reviews.title: This movie theater has Cigars and Booze!
customer_reviews.text: Simply amazing. Looks like the movies. After researching many options this seemed to have what we needed. Projecting on a 100" screen that is about 8' form the projector.
customer_reviews.author: Jake E.

customer_reviews.text: Spent way more on last projector. $2500 Epson I was scared to make the switch but so far this is just as good. I would rate it 4.4.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend it. It's amazing for the price very sharp colors.
customer_reviews.author: HellFrostOvernight

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good projector but the short throw isn't as good as the HT 1085st Thank you very much
customer_reviews.author: Terry Frost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent projector, major upgrade from the ones that i used before.
customer_reviews.author: Chez

customer_reviews.title: good ourchase
customer_reviews.text: my husband has to reset the volume all the time which is a pain with it being on the ceiling but otherwise the quality of the picture is great
customer_reviews.author: Nina

feature_bullets: CINEMATIC EXPERIENCE: The exact color palette used by Hollywood studios featuring 15, 000: 1 contrast, premium RGBRGB Color Wheel and Sick Certified Rec. 709 cinematic color reproduction

BIG SCREEN SHORT THROW PROJECTOR: 100" Image from just 8. 4' Easy installation and setup with a diagonal screen size of 60" - 180", 1. 3x zoom, Vertical Lens Shift and a throw ratio of 1. 15 - 1. 5 (79" @ 2m). Big Zoom: 1. 3: 1(3. 3mm)
QUIET PROJECTOR: Whisper quiet operation, with the lowest fan noise in its class allows viewers to hear the movie, not the projector
ENERGY EFFICIENT PROJECTOR: Includes Smart Eco technology for energy conservation and auto standby mode to save energy and prolong lamp life; lamp lasts up to 7, 000 hours
INCLUDED: 100% Rec. 709 Calibration Report. RELIABLE BRAND: Ban is the #1 best-selling DLP projector brand worldwide with 1 year for parts and labor.
